movie.title: Bernie
movie.plot: In small-town Texas, affable and popular mortician Bernie Tiede strikes up a friendship with Marjorie Nugent, a wealthy widow well known for her sour attitude. When she becomes controlling and abusive, Bernie goes to great lengths to remove himself from her grasp.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 18 nominations.
